issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Customer developed a project from the CLI and the .project file was missing these values: 

<nature>com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.nature</nature>
<nature>com.aptana.projects.webnature</nature>

Once we added them back we could enable services for the app in the proper org.  Without the values, the app shows it isn't part of any org and won't properly link to Crittercism and SOASTA.
fields.summary: CLI: Android - incomplete .project file causes project to not show as part of an Org in the tiapp.xml

comments.body: New projects created via the Titanium CLI do not include a {{.project}} file. This is an Appcelerator Studio file. With Studio 4.7, these natures were present in the project file.
Closing ticket as invalid with reference to the previous comments.
